text: The North Korean men's national under 20 ice hockey team is the national under-20 ice hockey team in North Korea. The team represents North Korea at the International Ice Hockey Federation's World Junior Hockey Championship Division III. == Tournament participation == ===World Championships=== *1988 - 23rd place (7th in Pool C) *1989 - 19th place (3rd in Pool C) *1990 - 18th place (2nd in Pool C) *1991 - 17th place (1st in Pool C) Promoted to Pool B *1992 - 16th place (8th in Pool B) Relegated to Pool C *1993 - 22nd place (6th in Pool C) *1994-08 - did not participate *2009 - cancelled *2010 - 37th place (3rd in Division III) *2011 - 37th place (3rd in Division III) *2012 - did not participate Junior Korea, North
title: North Korea men's national junior ice hockey team
